Configuration.UserComment: Bora's ED is: w25db104.mkm.can.ibm.com NOTE: for DEV & TESTING Purposes-LDAP URL changed to Bora's LDAP and NOT IBM Prod LDAP (i.e. bluepages.ibm.com)

SchemaItem.Name: accessHint
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN/DN pointer to an accessRole or accessGroup.

SchemaItem.Name: accountHint
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN/DN pointer to an account directory object.

SchemaItem.Name: additional
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: administrator
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/Administrator of entry

SchemaItem.Name: alternateAddress1
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/BPR3 Addition

SchemaItem.Name: alternateAddress2
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/BPR3 Addition

SchemaItem.Name: alternateLocalityName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the name of a locality, such as a city, county or other geographic region (localityName).

SchemaItem.Name: alternateNode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute - Employee Alternate Node

SchemaItem.Name: alternatePostalCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{40}/Postal code.

SchemaItem.Name: alternateSt
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/BPR3 Addition - This attribute contains the alternate full name of a state or province (alternateStateOrProvinceName).

SchemaItem.Name: alternateTelephoneNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: alternateTieline
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: alternateUserId
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Custom - BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: area
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: audio
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Contains a sound file in binary format.

SchemaItem.Name: backup
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN{1000}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: backupcountrycode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom - BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: backupserialnumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: bluepagesNotesIdError
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: buildingName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/Defines the building name associated with the entry.

SchemaItem.Name: businessCategory
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/This attribute describes the kind of business performed by an organization.

SchemaItem.Name: c
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains a two-letter ISO 3166 country code (countryName).

SchemaItem.Name: callupDateTime
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: callupName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: carLicense
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/vehicle license plate tag

SchemaItem.Name: cellServiceProvider
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/BPR3 Addition

SchemaItem.Name: cn
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MUST/String/This is the X.500 commonName attribute, which contains a name of an object. If the object corresponds to a person, it is typically the persons full name.

SchemaItem.Name: co
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{128}/Contains the name of a country. Often, the country attribute is used to describe a two-character code for a country, and the friendlyCountryName attribute is used to describe the actual country name.

SchemaItem.Name: configPtr
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN/DN pointer to a cimConfiguration-derived directory entry such as an ePropertySet.

SchemaItem.Name: contractorcompany
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: contractorrecordexpiration
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{128}/BPR3 Addition

SchemaItem.Name: coreDataIntegrity
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/Indicator of whether core attributes are trusted

SchemaItem.Name: costCenter
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{14}/2 character ISO country code, followed by the existing account department.

SchemaItem.Name: costcentereffectivedate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Cost Center Effective Date - Blue Harmony

SchemaItem.Name: deleter
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Exploiter DN of delete requester

SchemaItem.Name: department
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN{256}/DN of department entry

SchemaItem.Name: departmentNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/identifies a department within an organization.

SchemaItem.Name: dept
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Bluepages - Department Code

SchemaItem.Name: description
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{1024}/Attribute common to CIM and LDAP schema to provide lengthy description of a directory object entry.

SchemaItem.Name: destinationIndicator
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/This attribute is used for the telegram service.

SchemaItem.Name: directoryAlias
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: displayName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/A name used in displaying an entry in a one-line summary list.

SchemaItem.Name: div
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Bluepages - Division Code

SchemaItem.Name: divDept
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute - HR Sourced

SchemaItem.Name: emailAddress
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String

SchemaItem.Name: employeeNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entrys employee number.

SchemaItem.Name: employeeType
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{128}/Identifies the entrys type of employment.

SchemaItem.Name: employeecountrycode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Bluepages - Employee Personel Systems Code

SchemaItem.Name: entryType
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/Bluepages - Used to identify special entry types such as a test ID

SchemaItem.Name: facsimileTelephoneNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Identifies the fax number at which the entry can be reached.

SchemaItem.Name: facsimileTieline
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: floor
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/Floor location.

SchemaItem.Name: generationQualifier
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/Contains the part of the name which typically is the suffix, as in IIIrd.

SchemaItem.Name: givenName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/Used to hold the part of a persons name which is not their surname nor middle name.

SchemaItem.Name: glTeamLead
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN{64}/Global Extended Team Leader

SchemaItem.Name: historicPassword1
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: historicPassword2
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: historicPassword3
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: historicPassword4
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: historicPassword5
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary{128}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: homeFax
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number/Identifies the entrys home fax number.

SchemaItem.Name: homePhone
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number/Identifies the entrys home phone number.

SchemaItem.Name: homePostalAddress
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entrys home mailing address. This field is intended to include multiple lines, but each line within the entry should be separated by a dollar sign (\24). To represent an actual dollar sign (\24) or backslash (\) within this text, use the escaped hex values \24 and \5c respectively.

SchemaItem.Name: hrActive
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM Active/Inactive Code

SchemaItem.Name: hrAssignee
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM International Assignee In/Out Indicator

SchemaItem.Name: hrAssignment
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM International assignment indicator

SchemaItem.Name: hrCompanyCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM HRIW Company code

SchemaItem.Name: hrCountryCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM ISO 3166 Country Code

SchemaItem.Name: hrDepartment
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/ODM Career Department ID

SchemaItem.Name: hrDivision
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/ODM Division Code

SchemaItem.Name: hrEmployeeType
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM Employee type

SchemaItem.Name: hrFamilyName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/ODM Family name

SchemaItem.Name: hrFirstName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/ODM First name

SchemaItem.Name: hrInitial
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM Initials

SchemaItem.Name: hrLastName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/ODM Last name

SchemaItem.Name: hrManagerIndicator
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/Is-manager status in ODM

SchemaItem.Name: hrManagerPSC
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM Manager PSC

SchemaItem.Name: hrManagerSerial
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/IA5 String{16}/ODM Manager Serial Number

SchemaItem.Name: hrMiddleName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/ODM Middle name

SchemaItem.Name: hrOrgUnitCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{10}/Similar to a department, but can contain employees from multiple countries.

SchemaItem.Name: hrOrganizationCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/HR organization code

SchemaItem.Name: hrOtherName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/ODM Other name

SchemaItem.Name: hrPSC
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/ODM PSC

SchemaItem.Name: hrPreferredName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/ODM Preferred first name

SchemaItem.Name: hrSerialNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/IA5 String{240}/ODM Serial Number

SchemaItem.Name: ibmLoc
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - IBM Location Code

SchemaItem.Name: ibmserialnumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Employee Serial Number

SchemaItem.Name: infotelephonenumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: initials
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/The initials attribute contains the initials of some or all of an individuals names, but not the surname(s).

SchemaItem.Name: internalEmail
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: internalmaildrop
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: internationalISDNNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/IA5 String/Contains the ISDN number of the entry. This is in the internationally agreed format for ISDN addresses given in CCITT Rec. E. 164.

SchemaItem.Name: invalidmanagerdate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{8}/DRMS Addition

SchemaItem.Name: iptelephonenumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/IP Telephony Number

SchemaItem.Name: isNonExpiring
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{10}/Password isNonExpiring status (true false expired)

SchemaItem.Name: ismanager
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/BluePages - Manager Identifier

SchemaItem.Name: jobResponsibilities
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: jpegPhoto
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Contains a JPEG photo of the entry.

SchemaItem.Name: l
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the name of a locality, such as a city, county or other geographic region (localityName).

SchemaItem.Name: labeledURI
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Uniform Resource Identifier with optional label as defined in RFC2079.

SchemaItem.Name: locationCity
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: mail
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/Identifies a users primary email address (the email address retrieved and displayed by white-pages lookup applications).

SchemaItem.Name: manager
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN{1000}/Identifies the distinguished name of the entrys manager.

SchemaItem.Name: managerSerialNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Bluepages - Manager Serial Number

SchemaItem.Name: managercountrycode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Bluepages - Manager Personel System Code

SchemaItem.Name: middleInitial
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/Custom - BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: middleName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/Identifies the entrys middle name.

SchemaItem.Name: mobile
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Identifies the entrys mobile or cellular phone number.

SchemaItem.Name: nativeFirstName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/BluePages - First name in native language

SchemaItem.Name: nativeLastName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/BluePages - Last name in native language

SchemaItem.Name: notesEmail
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Notes Cannonical Name - Sourced From NAB

SchemaItem.Name: notesId
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/BluePages - Notes canonical ID without the mail domain - Sourced from NAB.

SchemaItem.Name: notesMailDomain
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Lotus Notes Mail Domain - Sourced From NAB

SchemaItem.Name: notesMailFile
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute - Lotus Notes Mail File

SchemaItem.Name: notesMailServer
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Lotus Notes Mail Server - Sourced From NAB

SchemaItem.Name: notesPublicKey
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary{4096}/Bluepages - Notes Certificate - Sourced from NAB

SchemaItem.Name: notesShortName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Lotus Notes Short Name - Sourced From NAB

SchemaItem.Name: o
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the name of an organization (organizationName).

SchemaItem.Name: objectclass
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MUST/OID/The values of the objectClass attribute describe the kind of object which an entry represents.

SchemaItem.Name: odmEntry
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Entry is found in ODM - Y or N

SchemaItem.Name: organizationalStatus
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Specifies a category by which a person is often referred to in an organization.

SchemaItem.Name: otherMailbox
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Specifies values for electronic mailbox types other than X.400 and rfc822.

SchemaItem.Name: ou
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the name of an organization (organizationName).

SchemaItem.Name: pager
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Identifies the entrys pager phone number.

SchemaItem.Name: pagerId
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/Custom - BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: pagerServiceProvider
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/BPR3 Addition

SchemaItem.Name: pagerType
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Custom - BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: passwordHistoryForChanges
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/Password History for Change Events

SchemaItem.Name: passwordHistoryForResets
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/Password History for Reset Events

SchemaItem.Name: passwordIsExpired
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Boolean{5}/Bluepages - Indicates this entrys password has been set to NULL on account of not having been changed in 186 days

SchemaItem.Name: passwordIsResetByAdmin
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Boolean{16}/Password Is Reset By IIP Administrator - for ED team use only

SchemaItem.Name: passwordIsStruckOut
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Boolean{5}/Bluepages - Indicates this entrys password has been set to NULL due to 5 unsuccesful logins

SchemaItem.Name: passwordModifyTimestamp
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Last time the users password was changed.

SchemaItem.Name: passwordisreset
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Boolean{5}/Bluepages - Indicates this password has been reset, not changed

SchemaItem.Name: pdif
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{1}/Bluepages - Indicates If HR-Sourced CallUp data usedin this entry was modified by the CallUp Admins - Sourced From CallUp(PDIF)

SchemaItem.Name: personalTitle
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Specifies a personal title for a person. Examples of personal titles are Mr, Ms, Dr, Prof and Rev.

SchemaItem.Name: phonemailnumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/BPR3 Addition - The Phone Mail Box of a Person

SchemaItem.Name: photo
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Contains a photo, in binary form, of the entry.

SchemaItem.Name: physicalDeliveryOfficeName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{128}/Physcial delivery office number.

SchemaItem.Name: postOfficeBox
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Post office box number.

SchemaItem.Name: postalAddress
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entry\27s mailing address. This field is intended to include multiple lines. When represented in LDIF format, each line should be separated by a dollar sign (\24).

SchemaItem.Name: postalCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Postal code.

SchemaItem.Name: preferredDeliveryMethod
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entry\27s preferred contact or delivery method.

SchemaItem.Name: preferredFirstName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/BPR3 Addition - Used to hold the part of a persons name which is not their surname nor middle name.

SchemaItem.Name: preferredIdentity
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/Preferred email address for Single Sign On

SchemaItem.Name: preferredLanguage
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/A persons preferred written or spoken language

SchemaItem.Name: preferredLastName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/BPR3 Addition - Duplicates the X.500 surname attribute, which contains the family name of a person.

SchemaItem.Name: previousManagerSerial
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/IA5 String{16}/Previous Manager Serial Number - for ED team use only

SchemaItem.Name: primaryNode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: primaryUserId
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Custom - BluePages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: pronoun
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{60}/The IBM Diversity Pronoun Field

SchemaItem.Name: registeredAddress
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains a postal address for receiving telegrams or expedited documents. The recipient\27s signature is usually required on delivery.

SchemaItem.Name: roomNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Specifies the room number of an object. Note that the commonName attribute should be used for naming room objects.

SchemaItem.Name: samAccountName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/CCUM/HCS Phone Number

SchemaItem.Name: secretary
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN{1000}/Identifies the entrys secretary or administrative assistant.

SchemaItem.Name: secretaryCountryCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Personel System Code

SchemaItem.Name: secretarySerialNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Employee Serial Number

SchemaItem.Name: seeAlso
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/Identifies another directory server entry that may contain information related to this entry.

SchemaItem.Name: serialnumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/This attribute contains the serial number of a device.

SchemaItem.Name: shift
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Shift code

SchemaItem.Name: sn
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MUST/String/This is the X.500 surname attribute, which contains the family name of a person.

SchemaItem.Name: st
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the full name of a state or province (stateOrProvinceName).

SchemaItem.Name: street
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/This attribute contains the physical address of the object to which the entry corresponds, such as an address for package delivery (streetAddress).

SchemaItem.Name: telephoneNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Telephone number.

SchemaItem.Name: teletexTerminalIdentifier
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Teletex terminal identifier.

SchemaItem.Name: telexNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Telex number.

SchemaItem.Name: territory
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{64}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: thumbNailLogo
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Thumbnail logo assoicated with a user.

SchemaItem.Name: thumbNailPhoto
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Thumbnail photo associated with a user.

SchemaItem.Name: tieline
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number{32}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: timeStampNISE
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{20}/The LOM server timestamp for the NISE application

SchemaItem.Name: timeStampOnboard
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/The LOM server timestamp for the onboard application

SchemaItem.Name: timeStampWorkday
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{20}/The LOM server timestamp for the HRMS Workday application

SchemaItem.Name: timestampBpgui
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/The LOM server timestamp for BluePages

SchemaItem.Name: timestampBpguiRI
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{20}/The LOM server timestamp for the BPGui Reimagined application

SchemaItem.Name: timestampFeed
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/The LOM server timestamp for the feed program

SchemaItem.Name: timestampHRMS
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/The LOM server timestamp for the HRMS application

SchemaItem.Name: title
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the title, such as Vice President, of a person in their organizational context. The personalTitle attribute would be used for a persons title independent of their job function.

SchemaItem.Name: tradeArea
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{16}/Custom - Blue Pages Attribute

SchemaItem.Name: uid
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{256}/Typically a user shortname or userid.

SchemaItem.Name: uniqueIdentifier
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Specifies a unique identifier for an object represented in the Directory. The domain within which the identifier is unique, and the exact semantics of the identifier, are for local definition.

SchemaItem.Name: userCertificate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Used to represent certificates from one or more Certification Authorities representing a user.

SchemaItem.Name: userPKCS12
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/PKCS \2312 PFX PDU for exchange of personal identity information

SchemaItem.Name: userPassword
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Holds a password value for a distinguished name.

SchemaItem.Name: userSMIMECertificate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Signed message used to support S/MIME

SchemaItem.Name: ventureCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{5}/IBM Venture Code

SchemaItem.Name: workLoc
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/Bluepages - Work Location Code

SchemaItem.Name: workLocation
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN{240}/Bluepages - DN of the ibmWorkLocation entry which corresponds to the workLoc attribute in of this same ibmPerson entry - Generated from workLoc value by Feed

SchemaItem.Name: workerId
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{32}/Workday Worker ID

SchemaItem.Name: workplaceIndicator
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{1}/PR3 Addition

SchemaItem.Name: x121Address
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/IA5 String/Defines the X.121 address of the entry.

SchemaItem.Name: x500UniqueIdentifier
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Used to distinguish between objects when a distinguished name has been reused. This is a different attribute type from both the uid and uniqueIdentifier types.

Hook.name: after_initialize
Hook.Name: after_initialize
Hook.Script: var bp = thisConnector.connector;

Hook.name: before_execute
Hook.Name: before_execute
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("__Step 4 - Look back Entry to Enterprise Server__"); //for Development & Debug purposes //need more coding to add to txn log file

Hook.name: close_fail
Hook.Name: close_fail

Hook.name: connect_init
Hook.Name: connect_init
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("On Connection error"+work); err.log("__On Connection Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__On Connection Error__");

Hook.name: default_fail
Hook.Name: default_fail

Hook.name: default_ok
Hook.Name: default_ok

Hook.name: initialize_fail
Hook.Name: initialize_fail

Hook.name: lookup_fail
Hook.Name: lookup_fail

Hook.name: lookup_multiple
Hook.Name: lookup_multiple

Hook.name: lookup_nomatch
Hook.Name: lookup_nomatch

Hook.name: after_lookup
Hook.Name: after_lookup
Hook.Script: var MyStat=1;

Hook.name: close_fail
Hook.Name: close_fail

Hook.name: connect_init
Hook.Name: connect_init

Hook.name: default_fail
Hook.Name: default_fail

Hook.name: default_ok
Hook.Name: default_ok
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("**Ok, In LCLookup-Entry found-populate Attributes"); //for Development & Debug purposes

Hook.name: initialize_fail
Hook.Name: initialize_fail
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("On Connection error"); err.log("__On Connection Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__On Error__");

Hook.name: lookup_fail
Hook.Name: lookup_fail

Hook.name: lookup_multiple
Hook.Name: lookup_multiple

Hook.name: lookup_nomatch
Hook.Name: lookup_nomatch
Hook.Script: //task.logmsg("**No Manager Entry Located**") //for Development & Debug purposes var MyStat=0; //setting check variable, if No Match<==> Good Path

SchemaItem.Name: audio
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Contains a sound file in binary format.

SchemaItem.Name: businessCategory
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/This attribute describes the kind of business performed by an organization.

SchemaItem.Name: carLicense
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/vehicle license plate tag

SchemaItem.Name: cn
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MUST/String/This is the X.500 commonName attribute, which contains a name of an object. If the object corresponds to a person, it is typically the persons full name.

SchemaItem.Name: departmentNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/identifies a department within an organization.

SchemaItem.Name: description
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Attribute common to CIM and LDAP schema to provide lengthy description of a directory object entry.

SchemaItem.Name: destinationIndicator
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/This attribute is used for the telegram service.

SchemaItem.Name: displayName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/A name used in displaying an entry in a one-line summary list.

SchemaItem.Name: edCreateTimestamp
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/attribute indicating ED Feed initial update.

SchemaItem.Name: edLeaver
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{1}/attribute value 1 indicating ED Feed leaver.

SchemaItem.Name: edModifyTimestamp
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/attribute indicating ED Feed update.

SchemaItem.Name: edfeed
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/multivalue, indicates reference(s) of this ibmPerson object, almost IBM-Bluepages, Starter or sideFeed URT/ASODUMMY orgs

SchemaItem.Name: edleaverApproved
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/attribute indicating ED Feed leaver.

SchemaItem.Name: edleaverTimestamp
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/attribute indicating ED Feed leaver.

SchemaItem.Name: employeeNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entrys employee number.

SchemaItem.Name: employeeType
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entrys type of employment.

SchemaItem.Name: erAcl
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary

SchemaItem.Name: erAliases
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String

SchemaItem.Name: erAuthorizationOwner
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN

SchemaItem.Name: erCreateDate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/ Time when the object is created

SchemaItem.Name: erCustomDisplay
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String

SchemaItem.Name: erGlobalId
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String

SchemaItem.Name: erImageURI
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/universal resource identifier of an object image

SchemaItem.Name: erIsDeleted
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String

SchemaItem.Name: erLastCertifiedDate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/ Time when the object was last certified

SchemaItem.Name: erLastModifiedTime
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String

SchemaItem.Name: erLastOperation
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Available for custom use for lifecycle event

SchemaItem.Name: erLastStatusChangeDate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Time when the status is updated

SchemaItem.Name: erLifecycleEnable
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Boolean/Flag for lifecycle operation on an entity

SchemaItem.Name: erLocale
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Preferred locale for a user

SchemaItem.Name: erParent
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN

SchemaItem.Name: erPersonPassword
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/person account password

SchemaItem.Name: erPersonStatus
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/INTEGER

SchemaItem.Name: erProfileName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Profile name of an object

SchemaItem.Name: erPswdLastChanged
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String

SchemaItem.Name: erRoleAssignments
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Person Role Assignment information

SchemaItem.Name: erRoleRecertificationLastAction
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Last recertification action applied to roles

SchemaItem.Name: erRoleRecertificationLastActionDate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Date that the last recertification action was applied to roles

SchemaItem.Name: erRoles
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN

SchemaItem.Name: erSharedSecret
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String

SchemaItem.Name: erSupervisor
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN

SchemaItem.Name: erSynchPassword
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Password to be used for account creation

SchemaItem.Name: erURI
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/universal resource identifier of an object

SchemaItem.Name: facsimileTelephoneNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number/Identifies the fax number at which the entry can be reached.

SchemaItem.Name: givenName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/Used to hold the part of a persons name which is not their surname nor middle name.

SchemaItem.Name: homePhone
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number/Identifies the entrys home phone number.

SchemaItem.Name: homePostalAddress
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entrys home mailing address. This field is intended to include multiple lines, but each line within the entry should be separated by a dollar sign (\24). To represent an actual dollar sign (\24) or backslash (\) within this text, use the escaped hex values \24 and \5c respectively.

SchemaItem.Name: initials
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/The initials attribute contains the initials of some or all of an individuals names, but not the surname(s).

SchemaItem.Name: internationalISDNNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/IA5 String/Contains the ISDN number of the entry. This is in the internationally agreed format for ISDN addresses given in CCITT Rec. E. 164.

SchemaItem.Name: jpegPhoto
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Contains a JPEG photo of the entry.

SchemaItem.Name: l
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the name of a locality, such as a city, county or other geographic region (localityName).

SchemaItem.Name: labeledURI
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Uniform Resource Identifier with optional label as defined in RFC2079.

SchemaItem.Name: mail
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies a users primary email address (the email address retrieved and displayed by white-pages lookup applications).

SchemaItem.Name: manager
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN/Identifies the distinguished name of the entrys manager.

SchemaItem.Name: mobile
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number/Identifies the entrys mobile or cellular phone number.

SchemaItem.Name: o
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the name of an organization (organizationName).

SchemaItem.Name: objectClass
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MUST/OID/The values of the objectClass attribute describe the kind of object which an entry represents.

SchemaItem.Name: ou
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the name of an organization (organizationName).

SchemaItem.Name: pager
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number/Identifies the entrys pager phone number.

SchemaItem.Name: photo
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Contains a photo, in binary form, of the entry.

SchemaItem.Name: physicalDeliveryOfficeName
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Physcial delivery office number.

SchemaItem.Name: postOfficeBox
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Post office box number.

SchemaItem.Name: postalAddress
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entry\27s mailing address. This field is intended to include multiple lines. When represented in LDIF format, each line should be separated by a dollar sign (\24).

SchemaItem.Name: postalCode
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Postal code.

SchemaItem.Name: preferredDeliveryMethod
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Identifies the entry\27s preferred contact or delivery method.

SchemaItem.Name: preferredLanguage
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/A persons preferred written or spoken language

SchemaItem.Name: registeredAddress
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains a postal address for receiving telegrams or expedited documents. The recipient\27s signature is usually required on delivery.

SchemaItem.Name: roomNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Specifies the room number of an object. Note that the commonName attribute should be used for naming room objects.

SchemaItem.Name: secretary
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/DN/Identifies the entrys secretary or administrative assistant.

SchemaItem.Name: seeAlso
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/Identifies another directory server entry that may contain information related to this entry.

SchemaItem.Name: sn
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MUST/String/This is the X.500 surname attribute, which contains the family name of a person.

SchemaItem.Name: sshKey1
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{2048}/ssh public key

SchemaItem.Name: sshKey2
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{2048}/ssh public key

SchemaItem.Name: sshKey3
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{2048}/ssh public key

SchemaItem.Name: sshKey4
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{2048}/ssh public key

SchemaItem.Name: sshKey5
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{2048}/ssh public key

SchemaItem.Name: sshKey6
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{2048}/ssh public key

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyFingerP1
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key fingerprint

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyFingerP2
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key fingerprint

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyFingerP3
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key fingerprint

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyFingerP4
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key fingerprint

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyFingerP5
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key fingerprint

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyFingerP6
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key fingerprint

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyGecos1
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key gecos

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyGecos2
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key gecos

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyGecos3
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key gecos

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyGecos4
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key gecos

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyGecos5
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key gecos

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyGecos6
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{240}/ssh key gecos

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyLength1
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/INTEGER/ssh key length

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyLength2
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/INTEGER/ssh key length

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyLength3
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/INTEGER/ssh key length

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyLength4
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/INTEGER/ssh key length

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyLength5
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/INTEGER/ssh key length

SchemaItem.Name: sshKeyLength6
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/INTEGER/ssh key length

SchemaItem.Name: sshkeyModTime1
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/modifiy timestamp

SchemaItem.Name: sshkeyModTime2
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/modifiy timestamp

SchemaItem.Name: sshkeyModTime3
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/modifiy timestamp

SchemaItem.Name: sshkeyModTime4
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/modifiy timestamp

SchemaItem.Name: sshkeyModTime5
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/modifiy timestamp

SchemaItem.Name: sshkeyModTime6
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Generalized Time/modifiy timestamp

SchemaItem.Name: st
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the full name of a state or province (stateOrProvinceName).

SchemaItem.Name: street
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/This attribute contains the physical address of the object to which the entry corresponds, such as an address for package delivery (streetAddress).

SchemaItem.Name: telephoneNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Telephone Number/Telephone number.

SchemaItem.Name: teletexTerminalIdentifier
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Teletex terminal identifier.

SchemaItem.Name: telexNumber
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Telex number.

SchemaItem.Name: title
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/This attribute contains the title, such as Vice President, of a person in their organizational context. The personalTitle attribute would be used for a persons title independent of their job function.

SchemaItem.Name: uid
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String/Typically a user shortname or userid.

SchemaItem.Name: userCertificate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Used to represent certificates from one or more Certification Authorities representing a user.

SchemaItem.Name: userPKCS12
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/PKCS \2312 PFX PDU for exchange of personal identity information

SchemaItem.Name: userPassword
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Holds a password value for a distinguished name.

SchemaItem.Name: userSMIMECertificate
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Signed message used to support S/MIME

SchemaItem.Name: x121Address
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/IA5 String/Defines the X.121 address of the entry.

SchemaItem.Name: x500UniqueIdentifier
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Binary/Used to distinguish between objects when a distinguished name has been reused. This is a different attribute type from both the uid and uniqueIdentifier types.

Hook.name: connect_init
Hook.Name: connect_init
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Connection error"); err.log("__On Connection Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "On Connection Error__");

Hook.name: default_fail
Hook.Name: default_fail
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Default On error"); err.log("__Default On Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__Default On Error__");

Hook.name: default_ok
Hook.Name: default_ok
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Modified ISIM Person completed")

Hook.name: initialize_fail
Hook.Name: initialize_fail
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("On Error error"); err.log("__Step 2-Modify Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__On Error__");

Hook.name: update_fail
Hook.Name: update_fail
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Update error"); err.log("__Step 2-Modify Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__Update Date__" );

Hook.name: connect_init
Hook.Name: connect_init
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Connection error"); err.log("__Step 2-Delete Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__On Connection Error__");

Hook.name: default_fail
Hook.Name: default_fail
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Default On error"); err.log("__Step 2-Delete Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__Default On Error__");

Hook.name: update_fail
Hook.Name: update_fail
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Update error"); err.log("__Step 2-Delete Error..Txn type on: "+MyID+" TxnType is: "+TxType + " Timestamp is: "+MyChgtime + " Error code: "+ "__Update Error__");

Hook.name: update_ok
Hook.Name: update_ok
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Modify for a Delete ISIM Person completed")

Hook.name: after_lookup
Hook.Name: after_lookup
Hook.Script: var MyStat=1;

Hook.name: close_fail
Hook.Name: close_fail

Hook.name: connect_init
Hook.Name: connect_init

Hook.name: default_fail
Hook.Name: default_fail

Hook.name: default_ok
Hook.Name: default_ok
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("**Ok, In LCLookup-Entry found-populate Attributes"); //for Development & Debug purposes

Hook.name: initialize_fail
Hook.Name: initialize_fail
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("Connection error");

Hook.name: lookup_fail
Hook.Name: lookup_fail

Hook.name: lookup_multiple
Hook.Name: lookup_multiple

Hook.name: lookup_nomatch
Hook.Name: lookup_nomatch

Hook.name: addonly_fail
Hook.Name: addonly_fail

Hook.name: close_fail
Hook.Name: close_fail

Hook.name: default_fail
Hook.Name: default_fail

Hook.name: default_ok
Hook.Name: default_ok
Hook.Script: task.logmsg("**Step 6 - ISIM Person Entry Added"); audit.log("__Step 6 - ADD Person to ISIM txn__");
